entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then a few flurries beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
